Welcome to my webpage!

My name is Sidney Silva and I'm a Web Developer from Spain. My favourite languages are JavaScript, Rust and PHP. I'm currently working on some projects with Laravel and Next.js, and I'm also learning Rust in my free time.

Despite being a Web Developer, my main goal is to become a Software Engineer and work on projects that can make a difference in the world. Maybe develop a new operating system, improoving AI or even working on the next big thing in the tech industry.
